entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New aggregateby tests don't work with native AOT #92387
  • [browser] setModuleImports() can only be used once? #92386
  • System.Text.Json: `JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull` is not working #92383
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_float_1_r/expl_float_1_r.dll #92382
    9.0.0
  • Some Merged Tests Will Never Fail or Pass Correctly Due to a Void Return Value #92381
    9.0.0
  • (Unmanaged) Strings in callbacks are not considered as blittable by WasmAppBuilder #92380
  • Regex Escape Sequence inconsistency in C# compared to C++ and VBScript #92379
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #92378
  • [Android] Add leg to test LLVM AOT tooling on Windows Hosts #92376
    9.0.0
  • Add additional `ThrowIf[CONDITION]` to more exceptions #92370
  • Pointer Type objects IsClass returning unexpected value. #92367
  • Add an option to the dotnet host to enable app-crashing exception details to be printed on a single line #92363
  • Allow `LibraryImport` `StringMarshalling.Utf8` to provide UTF-8 byte count to native code #92361
    9.0.0
  • ServerClosesConnection_ThrowsHttpProtocolException test failed with wrong exception type #92359
  • Avx2 code causes AccessViolationExceptions with AVX512 available #92357
    8.0.0
  • `ReadsWritesClosedFinish_StreamDisposed` test failures #92350
  • Incorrect value after truncating cast #92349
    8.0.0
  • [Breaking change?] Exception "Reflection-based serialization has been disabled for this application" is thrown on Mac Release #92345
    8.0.0
  • Selected apphost is not a valid PE file on s390x #92344
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory(String prefix) fails with Success exception in wasi-wasm build #92336
    9.0.0
  • JIT: IsContainableHWIntrinsicOp seems to discard many containment opportunities #92332
    9.0.0
  • Improve error message in scenaria where `JsonIgnore` is combined with `required` members. #92330
    Future
  • AggressiveOptimization makes wrong Vector256 optimization in .NET8 RC1 #92328
    8.0.0
  • Source generator for options validation leads to trimming warnings/errors in AOT #92327
    8.0.0
  • [NETSDKE2E]ASPNETCore.app runtime version for NET8 RC2 SDK is RTM. #92321

Closed

  • Config binder gen: further tighten filtering constraint for input binding method invocations #90687
    8.0.0
  • [Binder gen] To align with reflection impl, update property binding logic that handles missing config values #86333
    8.0.0
  • Config generator wrongly emits init-related exception in bind operations #90974
    8.0.0
  • How are we doing in the repo -- spot check #92377
  • ICorDebugGCReferenceEnum.Next fails to return stack references in .NET 8 preview 4 #87239
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 preview 7 and RC 1 seem to be ignoring IlcGenerateStackTraceData property #92373
  • [.NET 7]Integer auto-vectorization bug #83387
    8.0.0
  • Source generated configuration binder error #92343
  • CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory is not respected #92188
  • Will #88851 be backported to .NET Core 6 or 7? #92239
  • [wasm] CI improvements #92362
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != REG_XMM0' during 'Generate code' #91798
    9.0.0
  • .Net 8 RC1 WASM - compatibility - lack of support for older systems #92117
    8.0.0
  • Crash w/ Data Annotations Validation - Regression in RC1 #92276
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] Expected and actual version of WASI SDK does not match. Please delete /usr/local/wasi-sdk/ folder to provision a new version. #92233
  • [API Proposal]: Add static factory methods for collections in System.Collections.Generic #92133
  • Provide overloads for Enumerable.ToArray/ToList/ToHashSet for the initial capacity #91888
  • DateTimeOffset constructor returning incorrect offset on macOS & Linux #92084
    Future
  • Analyzer: Recommend upgrading to CompositeFormat for enhanced performance #85525
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Future of Numerics and AI - Provide a downlevel `System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives` class #89639
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: GetAsync_AllowedSSLVersion_Succeeds #57343
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http11.EventSource_UnsuccessfulRequest_LogsStartFailedStop #52095
    Future
  • SyncHttpHandlerTest_AutoRedirect.AllowAutoRedirect_True_ValidateNewMethodUsedOnRedirection failed with "Socket is already connected" on macOS #50271
    Future
  • A few loopback server tests are timing out in CI #30733
    Future
  • Timeout: OuterLoop SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ClientCertificates_Test.Manual_CertificateSentMatchesCertificateReceived_Success #41606
    Future
  • Outerloop ConnectTimeout_TimesOutSSLAuth_Throws intermitently fails #40798
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Test.GetAsync_SupportedSSLVersion_Succeeds - www.ssllabs.com #34434
    Future
  • QuicListener.AcceptConnectionAsync rethrowing exceptions #75115
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonNumberHandling.AllowReadingEmptyStringAsDefault #92331
  • Error NETSDK1013: The TargetFramework value '' was not recognized. #92251
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36799: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #91950
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36796: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91948
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36793: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91947
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36794: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91946
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36792: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #91944
    6.0.x
  • [LoongArch64] A plan for amending the LoongArch64‘s port #69705
    Future
  • ./build.sh libs.native fails #92194
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide ALC name in DispatchProxy for proxies in custom ALC #92385
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Ensure Bind can handle null from GetSection #92384
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Allow multiple post-build steps and allow templated pre and post-build steps #92375
    area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #92374
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fix the VN for xor operation #92372
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] JIT: Fix invalid containment of vector broadcasts #92371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92369
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark the ILLink test source generator as a source generator #92366
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fixes for LLVM AOT on Windows from @lateralusX #92365
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix error message printed if there's a missing context for get runtime delegate call in hostfxr #92364
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Properly handle debugger-enumerating interior pointers and enregistered refs #92360
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fixes for LLVM AOT on Windows from @lateralusX #92356
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • remove test exclusion #92355
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI test #92354
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix SIMD+EH check #92348
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [Mono]: Add missing case for constrained gsharedvt call. #92347
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by array schema #92337
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by value type schema #92334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92325
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Set the HAVE_FUNCTIONAL_PTHREAD_ROBUST_MUTEXES_EXITCOD value to 0 #92324
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix some assert's errors for ARM64-LoongArch64-RISCV64. #92319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Replace Riscv with RiscV #92318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #92316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move Native AOT outerloop tests to their own pipeline #91684
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-rc2][wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #92353
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Properly handle debugger-enumerating interior pointers and enregistered refs #92313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [release/8.0] Fix wasi build. #92368
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Fix invalid containment of vector broadcasts #92333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use Utf8JsonWriterCache in JsonNode.To{Json}String #92358
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92315
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update the assert for BlendVariable #92183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] porting DATAS change back to RC2 #92323
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Set severity of rule CA1870 to warning #92135
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add tests for indexing by object schema #92268
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono]: Add missing case for constrained gsharedvt call. #92338
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [release/8.0] Events for IL methods without IL headers #92317
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix downlevel build break in TensorPrimitives #92269
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 #92298
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi] Fix llvm target triple. #92256
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix trimming of DebuggerDisplay with Name #92191
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [QUIC] Throw ODE if connection/listener is disposed #92215
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Avoid unnecessary array allocation in JsonHelpers.Utf8GetString on netstandard #92304
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Don't generate AddMask as it requires more explicit consideration of semantics #92308
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: add missing xarch RMW case #92293
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fix options Validation with objects have indexers #92311
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix options Validation with objects have indexers #92309
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Prevent restoring illink for native-binplace.proj #92289
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Disable new tests failing on NativeAOT #92388
    area-System.Linq
  • [RISC-V] Atomics #92102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Light up BitArray APIs with Vector512 code path #91903
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add some convenience classes for node count JIT metrics, and automatic dumping from compShutdown #92112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Make a quirk in block morphing more explicit #92292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Build the PGO build legs through the global build job template #92296
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Excessive Encoding in Test Logs #92286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Add -skipcrossarchnative and -verbose options #90554
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Change GetParametersNoCopy to GetParametersAsSpan and use it in a few more places #92310
    area-System.Reflection
  • Improve performance of BigInteger.Multiply(large, small) #92208
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Bump version to GA #92305
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92274
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] Evaluation of methods on enums #92263
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • `JsonIgnoreCondition` controls are extended #69574
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Fix support for files with non-ascii characters on windows #92279
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [CI][Android] Build mono runtime for Android on PRs #91809
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Optimize JitStressOnly #91815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] cleanup for emscripten main in a web worker #92280
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • [browser] WASM side-car - multi-threading proposal #91731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • [browser] threads design #91696
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure the adapter name 100% matching when parsing proc/net/dev #92187
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish does not support DotNetPublishFiles #35581
  • Microsoft.NET.RuntimeIdentifierInference.targets incorrectly sets RID to win7-x86 / win7-x64 #35575
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] some deprecated global tools get NuGetPackageNotFoundException when installing #35566
  • [Bug]: ProjectReference not transitive during "Pack" on multi-targeted project #35567

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to 9.0 version of targeting pack #35601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip getting Windows GUI bit on non-Windows in AppHostShellShimMaker #35600
    untriaged, Area-CLI, 8.0.1xx
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Adjust trim/aot warning messages (#35186) #35595
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • We don't need this 🙃 #35594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add AOT test for CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #35593
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2272651 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use MicrosoftAspNetCoreComponentsSdkAnalyzersPackageVersion for aspnetcore version #35572
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use MicrosoftAspNetCoreComponentsSdkAnalyzersPackageVersion for aspnetcore version #35571
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest-9.0.100 as a dependency #35570
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest-8.0.100 as a dependency #35569
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rtm Branding #35538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Add name argument for dotnet new #33810
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Make NETSDK1083 link to RID doc #35546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: Add OCI Archive Format writing #35204
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544
  • Open issues for collection expression construction #7542

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: Update better conversion from expression rule #7547

Merged

  • Update LDM agenda #7546
  • Update primary-constructors.md with an open question #7545

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pointer type is parsed as LHS of multiply expression in `is` context #70049
  • Exception and several gold bars when using relational pattern on pointer type #70048
  • Feature 'Diagnostic analyzer runner' fails with gold bar when encountering list pattern on pointer type #70046
  • Autocompletion suggests keywords `and`/`or` after arrow of pointer member access in pattern matching #70045
    Backlog
  • Duplicate build errors are not collapsed in the error list #70044
  • Incorporate known spec violations #70043
  • Closing a document brings back stale diagnostics #70042
  • Add new applicable_kinds to distinguish between parameter of regular functions and parameters of anonymous functions #70037
  • Will IDE0305 not support Prepend? #70035
    Backlog
  • Wrong Error Message when bind ref struct's method to delegate #70034
  • C#: "Move to Namespace" does not appear for classes marked partial #70033

Closed

  • Reduce `int[]` allocations from BadArguments #69969
  • Analyzer errors while working in Roslyn: VisualBasicUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer throws InvalidCastException #70015
  • `GetTypeInfo` returns `TypeInfo` with null as `Type` for `ImplicitObjectCreationExpression` inside `CollectionExpression` #70041
  • ApiDesignGuidelines.BasicOverrideEqualsOnOverloadingOperatorEqualsAnalyzer throws NRE #70029

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Microsoft.DevDiv.Optimization.Data.PowerShell to 1.0803 #70051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add "Primary Constructors" to Compiler Test Plan.md #70050
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prevent infinite lookup cycle through bases of a containing type of an enum or a delegate type. #70047
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initialize usage of ProjectDependencyGraph.Empty to start with a null reverseReferencesMap #70036
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70031
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, 17.8

Merged

  • [Performance] Reduce array allocations of BadArguments #69970
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Avoid static overhead for switch-over-string optimization #69673
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70026
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Update msbuild locator to include SDK probing location changes #70038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Bump the NuGet.Frameworks version #70023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'use object/collection initializer' in VB. #70028
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to latest 8.0 preview version of MS.CA.NetAnalyzers package #70030
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Use vs-threading extensions where available #69932
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize allocations in TextReader.ReadToEnd utilized by SourceText.From #70017
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support converting collection-initializers to collection-expressions in more cases. #69983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle property without accessors in `Binder.ReceiverIsSubjectToCloning` #70009
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove indexer filtering from lookup #69947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update 'convert to raw string' to work with interpolated strings. #70006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix declaration snippets after `partial` keyword #69874
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #50850
  • [Blazor] Improvements to how SSR'd components are activated for interactivity #50849
    8.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: mapaction #50847
  • DotNet 8 rc breaks UsePathBase for Blazor Webassembly calling api methods on the server in visual studio #50844
  • SPA server doesn't stop when debugging in VS Code is stopped #50841
  • Add data-nosnippet in blazor-error-ui #50840
    Backlog
  • When using Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client with the .NET framework with a transport of Server Sent Events (SSE) stopping a connection takes a long time #50839
  • [8.0] RouteHandlerAnalyzer throws InvalidOperationException #50836
  • Transfer component state from server component to client component #50835
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor: Authorization taking too much time makes the component lose its state #50834
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Skip several Http3RequestTests #50833
  • Blazor messes up standard HTMLTemplateElement <template> #50831
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • RequestQuery won't be logged if it's the only logging field selected #50487
  • [Blazor] Error page support #49854
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor Web App is missing an error page #49853
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor error after update to .NET 8: Failed to start platform. #50755
  • Perf regression: updates #50832
  • Section outlet doesn't update when section content is rendered with streaming rendering #50804
    8.0-rc2
  • StreamRendering on first page continue to render after navigation #50733
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor WASM OIDC Authentication does not work with Zitadel Identity Provider #50812
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #50806
  • Accessibility testing for the Blazor Web template #49548
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    area-blazor
  • Fix Blazor error UI CSS, making the dismiss button visible #50846
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #50845
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Avoid allocating FormFeature in HttpRequest.HasFormContentType #50830
    area-networking

Merged

  • RequestQuery logging bug fix #50767
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Error page support for Server Side Rendered Razor Component Applications #50550
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix streaming into nonstreaming outlet #50843
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50838

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make senders be the same for different gesture EventArgs #17531
    Backlog
  • Polygon Borders do not properly calculate their inner path #17525
  • Image Border clipping incorrect on Windows #17523
  • Shell.SearchHandler visible in details page on Windows 11 #17521
  • Resolve performance issues introduced by Setter Specificity PR #17520
    .NET 8 GA
  • [BUG] Route parameter behavior is not consistent #17517
  • Abysmal performance in Interop on iOS #17516
  • [iOS] Fontawesome icon binding breaks flyout menu #17512
  • Disapearing controls in CollectionView on scrolling (on Android) #17508
  • Border bugs entries #17506
    .NET 8 GA
  • MAUI Error APT2096 failed to open APK:Invalid file #17503
  • [WinUI] Border inside ScrollView not expanding during resize #17502
    .NET 8 GA
  • all maui app crash on a multi-user android system #17501
  • [Windows] Border with rounded corners does not work well #17500
  • AndroidNativeLibrary not getting picked in `Release` mode. #17497

Closed

  • Obsolete AutomationProperties properties cause XamlC exception on NET 8 #17484
    .NET 8 GA
  • Cannot access a disposed object #17504
  • [NET 8, RC1, Windows] wrong initial BindingConext in CollectionView DataTemplate #17515

  • [Bug] Recipes Search Results currently can't be opened via keyboard #3145
    Backlog
  • DevTools not working #17476
  • SkiaSharp based component renders using Shell, does not render using normal navigation #7350
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] Full-screening a window no longer removes its title-bar #15676
    .NET 8 GA
  • Developing a Maui Blazor MacCatalyst app for Apple macOS store is a terrible experience #12293
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Maui Blazor template lacks entitlements necessary to submit to Apple macOS store #13094
    Backlog
  • [Windows]CollectionView not show Header and Footer #17499

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot generate compiled model with an enum using RC1 #31821
  • DetectChanges slow in long term contexts #31819
  • EF not generating SQL query correctly on fields that have conversion #31817

Closed

  • Unexpected ForeignKey despite being explicitly ignored in Convention-Based Model Configuration #31615
  • The issue of SQL statements following Sum after Groupby on EF6.0.5 #31733
  • Model Building: Reset precision for inherited model properties #31718
  • the function of Self join / Self referencing urgently needs to be easy to use in 8.0. #31645
  • Ability to use application logging subsystem #31613
  • Calling Select.Distinct inside of a Select causes duplicate parent entries if a value is null #31611
  • Incorrect version of dotnet ef tools - why so difficult to upgrade? #31596
  • Entity type configuration can run more than once, causing problems with seed data #31574
  • EntityFramework tools stop working after updating to VS 17.7 #31551
  • Linq Ef Core query doesn't include filter parameter for join table if not set in the same () parentheses #31536
  • EFCore Multiple Inserts - Json Column Null on Object with Same Properties #31529
  • It work for me #31484
  • Deadlocked transaction didn't rollback #31478
  • How to define global query filter expression using multi tenancy/non entity values in IEntityTypeConfiguration implementations? #31459
  • Error Updating a Json Column in an Entity not Tracked #31438
  • Please give me example how replace IModificationCommand to my implementation in MyDbContext #31434
  • Navigation Property that uses a foreign key from a different table for a middle table. #31410
  • Problem faced with transactions with EF6 for .net core 6 but was working fine in EF6 for .net framework #31112
  • No backing field could be found for property ... and the property does not have a setter #31740
    8.0.0
  • Change Tracker doesn't register updates in inner complex properties #31818
  • Custom key types with value converters throw in the compiled model #31770
    8.0.0
  • Unable to configure a nested complex type property #31726
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Store sentinel values as provider values in the compiled model #31810
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31811
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Don't throw for collection skip navigation without a setter #31796
  • Discover ComplexTypeAttribute on nested complex types #31808

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #31448 Use token for NonQueryResultAsync #31449
